com.quantimodo.tools.sdk.request

Class SdkRequest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.octo.android.robospice.request.SpiceRequest<T>
      • com.quantimodo.tools.sdk.request.SdkRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class of result, returned by loadDataFromNetwork() method
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<com.octo.android.robospice.request.SpiceRequest<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetCategoriesRequest, GetPublicSuggestedVariablesRequest, GetSuggestedVariablesRequest, GetUnitsRequest, GetVariableWithCacheRequest, SearchCorrelationsRequest, SearchCustomCorrelationsRequest, SendMeasurementsRequest, VoteCorrelationRequest

    public abstract class SdkRequest<T>
extends com.octo.android.robospice.request.SpiceRequest<T>
    Base class for request made for QuantimodoAPI Includes Quantimodo client, and AuthHelper. Redefines default retry policy.
